# Configuring wsprdaemon: wsprdaemon.conf

The template for a wsprdaemon.conf file, located in /home/wsprdaemon/wsprdaemon/, includes tons of stuff and looks dauntingly complicated. 
However, it boils down to setting up the following:
- [computer-related parameters](wsprdaemon.conf/computer.md)
- [receiver definitions](wsprdaemon.conf/receivers.md)
- [ka9q-radio parameters](wsprdaemon.conf/ka9q-radio.md)
- [reporting parameters](wsprdaemon.conf/reporting.md)
- [a schedule](wsprdaemon.conf/schedule.md)

## [Example wsprdaemon.conf](./wsprdaemon.conf/wsprdaemon.conf.md)
